description: This file is a shell script that manages network layer 2 interfaces, bridges, and VLAN configurations, primarily related to network initialization and management tasks within a router or network device environment.

methods.name: start_net
methods.description: Initializes and starts a network interface or subnet identified by NETID, sets status, registers members, and triggers firewall restart if specified.

methods.name: stop_net
methods.description: Stops a network interface identified by NETID, deconfigures members, deletes bridges, and updates status.

methods.name: load_net
methods.description: Loads network configuration parameters such as name, VID, and members from persistent storage into environment variables.

methods.name: sync_members
methods.description: Synchronizes network members based on current state, adding or removing interfaces as needed.

methods.name: sync_networks
methods.description: Syncs the network instances with the persistent data, starting or stopping networks as needed.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts all configured networks by invoking start_net for each.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Placeholder for stopping services; implementation not provided.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Placeholder for initialization routines; implementation not provided.

methods.name: handle_member_status_update
methods.description: Handles status updates of interface members, including registration and network status updates.
